ygData.subject: Re: Making Plat
ygData.msgSnippet: A somewhat tedious but still lucrative method involves Polar Bear Cloaks. You can make these for 5 plat each in Everfrost, and they will sell for 10-15 on
ygData.messageBody:
A somewhat tedious but still lucrative method involves Polar Bear Cloaks.
You can make these for 5 plat each in Everfrost, and they will sell for
10-15 on Faydwer... possibly more these days.

Involves travel and some work, but quite a lot of money can be made by doing
this.

Alternatively, you are close to Wisp time.... Greater Lightstones will get
you almost ten plat each, and they aren't terribly hard to find. :)

----- Original Message -----
From: Omeg Felligan <omeg_felligan@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, November 08, 1999 4:04 AM
Subject: [EQCheats] Making Plat


: From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
:
: Ok, anyone have any ways to make plat with some amount of speed? I'm a
: level 7(almost 8) Erudite Mage saving for a large item (Flowing Black
Robe,
: and other expensive stuff). I have about 70 Plat so far and was wondering
: if anyone had a way of making plat other than "have your high lvl get it
: then..." b/c I don't have any high levels on this server :).
:
: Thanks,
: Omeg

: : Get paid to surf the web! Free!
